distinct
from spt_member
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into spt_member (ID, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_ABBR, MEMBER_REGISTER_ADDR, MEMBER_ADDR, CORPORATION, TOP_MANAGER, CONTACT, CONTACT_INFORMATION, UNIT_PROPERTY, INDUSTRY, BUSINESS_AREA, BUSINESS_EXPIRE, CAPTIAL, STAFF_COUNT, PRODUCT_VALUE, REMARK, RES_DESC, ABILITY_DESC, JOIN_TIME, SERVICE_TIME, SERVICE_SUCCESS_TIME, PROTOCOL_URL ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{memberNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberAbbr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberRegisterAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{memberAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{corporation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{topManager,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contactInformation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{unitProperty,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessArea,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessExpire,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{captial,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{staffCount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{abilityDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{joinTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{serviceTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{serviceSuccessTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{protocolUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
